articles.title: Game Pass Ultimate Perks offers free Apple TV+ and Apple Music trials - TrueAchievements
articles.description: Xbox Game Pass Ultimate members can now redeem trials for both Apple TV+ and Apple Music via Game Pass Perks, both of which can be used on Xbox Series X|S and Xbox One consoles.
articles.content: Microsoft has partnered with Apple to offer a pretty cool pair of Xbox Game Pass Ultimate Perks for the holiday season. Members who don't currently have subscriptions for Apple TV+ or Apple Music can… [+1374 chars]
